statements: SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control WHERE role = 'analyst' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control WHERE username LIKE '%manager%' AND tool_permissions->>'firewall' = 'read';
SELECT role, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control GROUP BY role HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control WHERE role='admin'
SELECT username, tool_permissions->'access_level' AS access_level FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control WHERE tool_permissions->'access_level' > 2
SELECT user_id, username, role, jsonb_array_elements(tool_permissions->'tools')->>'tool_name' AS tool_name FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM cybersecurity_role_based_access_control
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.role = permissions.permission_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name WHERE users.user_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT permissions.permission_name FROM permissions INNER JOIN roles ON permissions.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'editor';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name WHERE users.username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'editor';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'User' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
